about_the_game:
Unlocks the playable character "Soriz" in Granblue Fantasy: Versus.
Comes with other additional contents, including a special "Soriz" lobby avatar.

Contents
■Playable Character "Soriz"
■Lobby Avatar x1
■Star Character Icon x1
■Additional RPG Mode Quest x2

Notice:
These contents are also sold as part of a set. Be careful not to purchase the contents twice.

In order to use this downloadable content, you will need the main product, which is sold separately. The latest content update may be required.

This set does not include digital purchase bonuses for the original smartphone/browser game Granblue Fantasy.
detailed_description:
Unlocks the playable character "Soriz" in Granblue Fantasy: Versus.
Comes with other additional contents, including a special "Soriz" lobby avatar.

This set does not include digital purchase bonuses for the original smartphone/browser game Granblue Fantasy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz / Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6870, 1 GB / GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: "Soriz" is a DLC for use with Granblue Fantasy: Versus.
